backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries describing required updates to frontend/index.html, including AdSense, Clarity, metadata, and placeholder cleanup.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional descriptions used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including metadata, AdSense script, Microsoft Clarity script, and the root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component routing between the tester and about pages using internal state.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/AnalogCa: UI panel for adjusting joystick dead zones with live raw/calibrated values and controller-specific support checks.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/AxesVisu: Visualizes controller axis values with animated bars and active-state indicators.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/ButtonGr: Displays a grid of buttons showing pressed/touched states with percentage values and visual highlights.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/ButtonHe: Tracks button press counts and displays them as a heatmap with color intensity and a reset option.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/Controll: Renders tabs or a label for selecting among connected controllers using detected controller names.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/DriftTes: Captures and charts joystick axis drift over time, with controls to start, stop, and reset data collection.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/GyroImuP: Reads motion/orientation data from a controller and visualizes it by rendering a 3D rotating cube on a canvas.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/LatencyT: Runs a reaction-style latency test by timing button press response and tracking history with basic stats.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterFe: Displays a grid of feature descriptions with icons explaining the tool’s capabilities.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterHo: Shows a step-by-step guide with icons explaining how to connect and test a gamepad.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterPo: Aggregates SEO, features, how-to, FAQ, and supported gamepad list sections into a single page layout.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSe: Displays SEO-focused marketing content explaining features, usage, and supported controllers for the tester.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/Vibratio: Provides UI and logic to test controller vibration using available Gamepad API haptic actuators.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/WaitingF: Shows an animated waiting screen prompting users to connect a controller.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Site-wide layout providing header navigation, main content area, and footer with external link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGamepads.ts: Polls the Gamepad API to track connected controllers, auto-selects one, and updates state on connect/disconnect.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that backend methods are unused and gamepad features are client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers plus OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode and defines utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/lib/analogCalibration.ts: Implements dead‑zone calibration for analog stick axes and exports default calibration settings.
frontend/src/lib/controllerDetection.ts: Detects controller type from gamepad ID and returns metadata including supported features.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with feature descriptions, usage steps, and styled icon sections.
frontend/src/pages/TesterPage.tsx: Main testing UI that shows connection status, controller tabs, detection info, and multiple diagnostic panels with per‑controller calibration state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with OKLCH color variables, custom animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, issues, architecture notes, and required integration fixes.
